author: pburba
msg: OS400/EBCDIC Port: Create new files with CCSID 1208.
This is one of several patches to allow Subversion to run on IBM's
OS400 V5R4.  It tags files created by Subversion with the CCSID 1208
(UTF-8), which is always correct for text files and irrelevant for
binary files, and allows OS400 applications and utilities to operate

author: rooneg
msg: Add some error checking around use of svn_wc_entry() in libsvn_wc. Normally
these cases can not happen, but with a mangled entries file you never know.
Include svn_private_config.h to get definition of the _() macro.
(svn_wc_diff3): Check that entry is not NULL.
(svn_wc_crawl_revisions2): Check that parent_entry is not NULL.
(svn_wc_transmit_text_deltas): Check that ent is not NULL.
(log_do_modify_entry): Check that tfile_entry is not NULL, not entry.
(svn_wc_get_ancestry): Check that ent is not NULL.
(handle_dir_entry): Check that full_entry is not NULL.
(merge_file): Check that e is not NULL.
(svn_wc_add_repos_file2): Check that ent is not NULL.
(compare_and_verify): Check that entry is not NULL.
(svn_wc__get_keywords): Check that entry is not NULL.
